metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6336 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1 allows remote authenticated users with undelete permissions to bypass intended suppressrevision and deleterevision restrictions and remove the revision deletion status of arbitrary file revisions by using Special:Undelete.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6336` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.1').
